com.facebook.buck.core.graph.transformation

Interface GraphTransformationEngine<ComputeKey,ComputeResult>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGraphTransformationEngine

    public interface GraphTransformationEngine<ComputeKey,ComputeResult>
    Transformation engine that transforms supplied ComputeKey into ComputeResult via GraphTransformer. This engine is able to asynchronously run graph based computation, reusing results when possible. Note that the computation graph must be an acyclic graph.

    This engine is able to deal with dependencies in the computation graph by having Transformer request dependent results of other transformations through GraphTransformer.discoverDeps(Object)

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<ComputeKey,Future<ComputeResult>> computeAll(Set<ComputeKey> keys)
        Asynchronously computes the result for multiple keys
